xades4j.verification
Interface CustomSignatureVerifier

public interface CustomSignatureVerifier

Interface for custom signature verifiers. Custom verifiers may validate the signature has a whole. They are invoked in the end of signature verification.

Custom verifiers are registered through the XadesVerificationProfile.withCustomSignatureVerifier(xades4j.verification.CustomSignatureVerifier) method.

Method Summary
 void verify(XAdESVerificationResult verificationData, QualifyingPropertyVerificationContext ctx)
